paragraphs.text: Common phrases: “Hold me back” - “Who are you calling small?!” - “Let me have em!” - “I’m human you doofus”
Weakness: Terrified of water and frogs

Background: Anya grew up in a human family, always thinking they were her biological parents, her mama always said everyone is different and that was right because her brother Morris was dumb as a door, at least she just looked different. She’d never seen anyone like her but that was okay.
Make sure you attack when there's another player within melee range to gain sneak attack on your attack

full_text:
Kitanya Neaze

Goblin - Rouge Criminal

Common phrases: “Hold me back” - “Who are you calling small?!” - “Let me have em!” - “I’m human you doofus”

Weakness: Terrified of water and frogs

Background: Anya grew up in a human family, always thinking they were her biological parents, her mama always said everyone is different and that was right because her brother Morris was dumb as a door, at least she just looked different. She’d never seen anyone like her but that was okay.

Character sheet:

Tips!!!

Make sure you attack when there's another player within melee range to gain sneak attack on your attack

Session 3 notes 10/02/2020

Flanking.
